page.title: 03Government of Sedlescombe
page.content:
This area is very largely served by Sedlescombe Parish Council which concerns itself with the very local matters including maintenance of public footpaths, care of the Village Green and the general appearance of the village. Sedlescombe has, for several years, won the Best Kept Small Village competion in East Sussex.
Rother District Council is directly responsible for facilities such as roads, and services such as refuse disposal.
Overseeing all of this is East Sussex County Council which is responsible for Highways, Education, Health and the Police Force.
